mapper.select: select g.*, gr.order_id, gr.create_time as sell_time, gr.price from goods_order as gr left join goods as g on g.goods_id = gr.goods_id where gr.order_user = #{userId}
select g.*, gr.order_id, gr.create_time as sell_time, gr.price from goods_order as gr left join goods as g on g.goods_id = gr.goods_id where g.user_id = #{userId}

select go.order_id,g.goods_name,g.goods_price,g.image,u.nick_name,go.price,go.create_time from goods_order as go inner join goods as g on g.goods_id = go.goods_id inner join wx_user as u on u.user_id = go.order_user where 1=1 and g.TYPE ='0'
and g.goods_name like concat('%',#{goodsName},'%')
order by go.create_time desc

select go.order_id,g.goods_name,g.goods_price,g.image,u.nick_name,go.price,go.create_time from goods_order as go inner join goods as g on g.goods_id = go.goods_id inner join wx_user as u on u.user_id = go.order_user where 0=0 and g.TYPE ='1'
and g.goods_name like concat('%',#{goodsName},'%')
order by go.create_time desc
